Quick Start

# Show help
typeberry --help

# Run with default settings
typeberry --chain-spec tiny

# Import blocks
typeberry import blocks.json

# Custom database path
typeberry --db-path ./my-database

Available Files

  • typeberry.cjs - Main executable (latest)
  • typeberry.cjs.map - Source map
  • ed25519_wasm_bg.wasm - Ed25519 crypto
  • bandersnatch_wasm_bg.wasm - Bandersnatch crypto
  • reed_solomon_wasm_bg.wasm - Reed-Solomon coding
